chapters.title: Chapter 9: Tellings of the Wheel
chapters.info: Eldrene ay Ellan ay Carlan, p. 110—Queen of Manetheren during the Trolloc Wars, wife of Aemon, her Warder. It was said that she was so beautiful flowers bloomed to make her smile. She was also called Ellisande, “Rose of the Sun” in the Old Tongue. See also al Caar al Thorin, Aemon.
